Entities.description: Click here and select the Body object from the Base-Module output in the Dynamic content menu
Entities.title: Base Module Body

LookbackInDays.description: Enter the number of days you want to lookback in the Threat Intelligence data

body.message:
A total of @{length(outputs('Compose_-_DetailedResults'))} matching TI indicators were found.

@{body('Create_HTML_table')}
@{if(equals(body('Parse_JSON')?['ModuleVersions']?['TIModule'], null), '', if(not(equals(body('Parse_JSON')?['ModuleVersions']?['TIModule'], parameters('PlaybookVersion'))), concat('
Sentinel Triage AssistanT - Threat Intel Update Available: Installed Version: ', parameters('PlaybookVersion'), ', Available Version: ', body('Parse_JSON')?['ModuleVersions']?['TIModule']), ''))}

Compose_-_Domain.inputs:
let domains = '@{replace(string(body('Parse_JSON')?['Domains']), '''', '\''')}';
let domainEntities = datatable(temp:string)['']
| extend Entities = parse_json(domains)
| mv-expand todynamic(Entities)
| project DomainName = tolower(tostring(Entities.RawEntity.domainName));
domainEntities
| join kind=inner (ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where isnotempty(DomainName)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IndicatorId
| where Active == true
| extend DomainName = tolower(DomainName)) on DomainName
| project TIData=DomainName, SourceSystem, Description, ThreatType, ConfidenceScore, IndicatorId

Compose_-_File_Hash.inputs:
let hashes = '@{replace(string(body('Parse_JSON')?['FileHashes']), '''', '\''')}';
let hashEntities = datatable(temp:string)['']
| extend Entities = parse_json(hashes)
| mv-expand todynamic(Entities)
| project FileHashValue = tolower(tostring(Entities.RawEntity.hashValue)), Algorithm = tostring(Entities.RawEntity.algorithm);
hashEntities
| join kind=inner (ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where isnotempty(FileHashValue)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IndicatorId
| where Active == true
| extend FileHashValue = tolower(FileHashValue)) on FileHashValue
| project TIData=FileHashValue, SourceSystem, Description, ThreatType, ConfidenceScore, IndicatorId

body.Error: @{parameters('PlaybookInternalName')} module failed to execute with status @{outputs('HTTP_-_File_Hash')['statusCode']}

Compose_-_IP.inputs:
let ipData = '@{replace(string(body('Parse_JSON')?['IPs']), '''', '\''')}';
let ipEntities = datatable(temp:string)['']
| extend Entities = parse_json(ipData)
| mv-expand todynamic(Entities)
| project IPAddress = tostring(Entities.Address), Latitude = todecimal(Entities.GeoData.latitude), Longitude = todecimal(Entities.GeoData.longitude), Country=tostring(Entities.GeoData.country), State=tostring(Entities.GeoData.state);
ipEntities
| join kind=inner (ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IndicatorId
| where Active == true
| where isnotempty(NetworkIP) or isnotempty(EmailSourceIpAddress) or isnotempty(NetworkDestinationIP) or isnotempty(NetworkSourceIP)
| extend tiIP = coalesce(NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, NetworkSourceIP, EmailSourceIpAddress)) on $left.IPAddress == $right.tiIP
| project TIData=IPAddress, SourceSystem, Description, ThreatType, ConfidenceScore, IndicatorId

Compose_-_URL.inputs:
let urls = '@{replace(string(body('Parse_JSON')?['URLs']), '''', '\''')}';
let urlEntities = datatable(temp:string)['']
| extend Entities = parse_json(urls)
| mv-expand todynamic(Entities)
| project Url = tolower(tostring(Entities.RawEntity.url));
urlEntities
| join kind=inner (ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where isnotempty(Url)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IndicatorId
| where Active == true
| extend Url = tolower(Url)) on Url
| project TIData=Url, SourceSystem, Description, ThreatType, ConfidenceScore, IndicatorId
